sentences.sContent: Armenia lacks a seacoast or a port.
sentences.sContent_eng: Armenia lacks a seacoast or a port.
sentences.sCn: 亚美尼亚没有海岸和港口。

sentences.sContent: The group's boat capsized in rough seas as the pirates raced away from patrolling warships off the coast of Somalia. 3 other pirates aboard the boat were rescued on the nearby seacoast.
sentences.sContent_eng: The group's boat capsized in rough seas as the pirates raced away from patrolling warships off the coast of Somalia. 3 other pirates aboard the boat were rescued on the nearby seacoast.
sentences.sCn: 据悉，他们在躲避索马里海域巡逻的军舰时遇到风浪，船被打翻，船上的另外3名海盗在附近海岸获救。

trans.tranOther: land bordering on the sea; a coast
